Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays in both directions. We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays in both directions. We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
